item.title: Struggles when migrating from ES 6.8 to ES 7.5
item.description: What problems I encounter when migrating from ES 6.8 to ES 7.5 and how to avoid them.

item.title: How to define "proper" function in Fable
item.description: Little insight, how the definition of a function in F# would result in a Javascript code.

item.title: Running Canopy in Docker container
item.description: In this article you will see how to write and run Canopy tests inside of Docker Container.

item.title: Visualization of estates on a map with Fable
item.description: From time to time I look at bailiff auctions. To check if there are some interesting properties for sale. If I want to check where they are located I have to go into details of each auction. I felt it would be great to see all of them on the map, so I could filter them by localization or district.

item.title: Deleting old branches using Azure Functions
item.description: Doing a `git branch` lists a milion of branches on a remote? You have some policies in a team to delete branch after merging, but let's be serious, someone remember about that? You don't have to worry in this article you will find how to write automatic Deleter (as a time trigger Azure Function) of old stale branches from AzureDevops.

item.title: Testing application continuously with Canopy and Azure Pipelines
item.description: In this article you will see how to write and run Canopy tests on Azure Pipelines.

item.title: AppInsights logging full requests with hidding sensitive data
item.description: In our application, daily, we are using Application Insights. To look at the details of a request/response, we store the body of them in a separate Log database. As long as the application growth, we thought it would be easier for us to have everything in one place. So we planned to involve everything in ApplicationInsights.

item.title: Batching Events via BatcherBlock
item.description: In our systems, we send notifications. But as long as the application grows it starts working slowly. Wee decided to implement the mechanism, which responsibility would be to collect events, group them, eliminate duplicates and then after some interval send them to the end devices.

item.title: Serialization of F# UnionType
item.description: Union Type serialization is not a built-in option in Newtonsoft.Json. In this article we will take a look how to work around that.

item.title: GraphQL error propagation
item.description: In this post we gonna take a look at available options on how to propagate errors in GraphQL
